title: Potentia
description: A city settled in an area subjugated by Rome during the fourth century BC. The local populace rebelled against Rome after the defeat at Cannae (216 BC), however the defeat of the Carthaginians eventually led to Potentia's reincorporation into the Roman sphere.

properties.description: 1:500,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 7091
